title: Sources: 76ers, Embiid exploring options for knee
description: The 76ers and Joel Embiid are consulting doctors and considering alternative options, such as surgery, to treat his injured knee, sources told ESPN.
author: Shams Charania

title: Sources: QB Sanders won't work out at combine
description: Colorado quarterback Shedeur Sanders will not work out at the scouting combine in Indianapolis this week, sources confirmed to ESPN.
author: Jeff Legwold

title: 6 intriguing players we're paying close attention to in spring training
description: Is James Wood going to break out for Washington? Is Roki Sasaki the real deal? Can Mike Trout stay healthy? There's no shortage of MLB drama, even now.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: NASCAR: Christopher Bell wins with last-lap pass at Atlanta
description: Bell passed Kyle Larson before the caution flew on the final lap.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: 'Let's call it now - the title race is over, Liverpool will be champions'
description: Football can be strange and unpredictable, writes Phil McNulty, but make no mistake - the Premier League title is Liverpool's.

title: Rangers sack Clement following loss to St Mirren
description: Rangers sack manager Philippe Clement the day after a home loss to St Mirren left them 13 points behind Premiership leaders Celtic.

title: Record-breaking Kohli leads India to victory against rivals Pakistan
description: Virat Kohli became the fastest player to 14,000 ODI runs as he hit 100 not out to guide India to a six-wicket victory over Pakistan in the Champions Trophy at the Dubai International Stadium.

title: Pep insists Man City future is bright as Neville calls for 'full reset'
description: Gary Neville believes Manchester City have "run out of legs" and need a "full reset" after their latest defeat to Premier League leaders Liverpool.
